creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
description: soft-bound book with blue cover; white label with black text on cover; calligraphic text with images of court scenes including men and women in interiors and primarily in gardens; some pages have added inscriptions (written or stamped in ink) in illustrations; image of man viewing a volcano (?) has hand-applied shading; image of seated man with three hand-applied snakes and plant; last page has ink inscriptions and drawing fir branches (?)
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
title: New Edition of the Anthology of Waka Poems with Pictures by Sōgi, vol. 2
